story.title: AMIA 2017: The Other Hashtag
story.description: Two AMIAs and two conferences at about the same time every year. Archivists = #AMIA17 Medical Informatics = #AMIA2017. Sometimes they intersect. Here are the Archivists on #AMIA2017.

quote.text: Thank you to the Association of Moving Image Archivists (AMIA) for an outstanding conference in New Orleans this year. #Archival #Film #ArchiveOnFilm #AMIA2017

attribution.bio: A collective of Engineers, Archivists, Preservationists, Chemists, Curators, Technicians and Cinematographers working to bring a new Photochemical Lab to LA.
attribution.name: Gotham Photochemical

quote.text: @nathan_avant @AMIAnet @BMAatUGA Oh noes! #hashtagcollissions #amiatraditions #damnyouautocorrect #amia17 #AMIA2017

attribution.bio: Archives, movies, metadata
attribution.name: Erwin Verbruggen

unwound.description: The Keynote for AMIA 2017 will build on the discussions from last yearâ€™s conference plenary, the subsequent adoption of AMIAâ€™s Diversity, Inclusion, and Equity Statement, and our work to refine a Code of Conduct. Diversity, inclusion, and equity goals should be anchored in an organizationâ€™s shared values and aspirations.
